content.raw:
homebrew doesn't do cppcheck for some reason

I had to add an extra flag to cppcheck in 7717e5794fe5, but I think it's fixed now; thanks

content.raw: In pull request #2506, we are moving towards using inline code comments for cppcheck suppressions, for example [STLLoader.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2506/clean-cppcheck-result-in-xenial/diff#chg-gazebo/common/STLLoader.cc). Can you try doing that here?
content.html: In pull request #2506, we are moving towards using inline code comments for cppcheck suppressions, for example STLLoader.cc. Can you try doing that here?

content.raw: I think this should stay as a single `<` so that it recreates the file from scratch, rather then appending to old versions of the file each time.
content.html: I think this should stay as a single < so that it recreates the file from scratch, rather then appending to old versions of the file each time.
